name: Silly Shooter
description:
Silly Shooter is a 3D third-person shooter game that is very fun and easy to play. You are challenged to outlast waves of enemies by shooting and avoiding them. You can unlock new hats and cosmetic items to customise your player with by reaching certain wave numbers.

Overall, Silly Shooter is a relaxed and enjoyable game to play.

I would greatly appreciate it if you commented your high score, any feedback or any bugs that you encounter.
